p: The cluster analysis revealed four clusters based on biological activities ( Figure 1). Cluster 1 is made up of essential oils that showed good antileishmanial activity with little or no cytotoxicity. The very large cluster 2 can be described as essential oils that showed relatively weak antileishmanial activity and relatively weak cytotoxic activity, cluster 3 is composed of essential oils with both moderate antileishmanial activity but also with moderate cytotoxic activity, and cluster 4 is made up of essential oils that were very cytotoxic.
